nodes.text: The Shalam system was a star system with at least one crimson star. Lieutenant Yrica Quell, a pilot in the New Republic, investigated the system as a potential location where the Galactic Empire's 204th Imperial Fighter Wing may have crossed paths with the New Republic several weeks after the Battle of Endor in 4 ABY. She found no evidence that any attack might have taken place and moved on.

The Shalam system first appeared in the 2019 novel Alphabet Squadron, which was written by Alexander Freed. The star system was originally introduced in Star Wars Legends in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace.
